p: The epidemic of COVID-19 poses new challenges to diagnosis and treatment of the patients with orthopedic diseases [ 8]. We medical workers are bearing important responsibilities and pressure during the epidemic. Orthopedic surgeons performed the superiority of accurate diagnosis and treatment for patients, summarized how to carry out the clinical practice of orthopedic surgery under the situation of the prevention and control of the COVID-19, and minimized the risk of infection exposure. Reasonable treatment strategies were changed and adopted timely to minimize the adverse effects on the treatment of orthopedic patients during the epidemic.
